partEffect.0: Tempest Form duration increased by 10 seconds. When Tempest Form has less than 10 seconds remaining, deal +15% damage.
Critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Karma Breaker's damage over time by 5% until the debuff ends or is refreshed.
Surge deals +25% damage. After surging, gain +5% movespeed for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Unleash energy in a focused blast, dealing 900 damage to the first enemy hit. Deals up to +100% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
Unleash energy forward in a pressure wave, dealing 600 damage to the closest target and 200 damage to nearby target. Deals up to +100% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
Perfectly charged attacks grants +15 meter on hit, but no longer grant resolve.
Movespeed while charging Horizontal Attacks is now increased instead of decreased and costs no stamina to maintain.
Determination can now stack up to 4 times.
Tonics consumed while your axe is thrown have +50% effectiveness.
Charging attack deals aoe damage to nearby enemies at each charge level.
Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies while thrown. Reactivate to call the axe and perform a powerful overhand swing that can generate determination.
Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path before landing a distance away. Hitting a Behemoth can generate Resolve and will bounce the axe back towards the user.

Hurl the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path. Catch the axe to throw it again up to 2 more times in the next 5 seconds, dealing 500/600/1000 damage (further increased by determination). Does not build meter.
After using a special, deal +100% damage to objects created by Behemoths for 6 seconds.
Using Blade Spin grants stacking on-next hit damage that is consumed when using other attacks.
Dashing towards a Behemoth reduces stamina cost of the dash by 50%.
After using a special, your next special use within 4 seconds is free.
Bladed attacks have a chance to cause your next swinging blades to be a critical strike.
Use to teleport forward, damaging enemies if present. Can teleport through Behemoths.

From afar: Pull to targets and grant a stack of Insatiable Dance. While close: Push off targets, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary followup grants a stack of Insatiable Dance. Secondary followup expends stacks and creates a 50 health healing orb per stack.
Use close to a Behemoth to push off, dealing damage. Use from far to pull in quickly to a Behemoth.
Ammo decreased to 2, but bonus from aethercharged ammo is increased by 300%.
Ammo increased to 6.
Aerial Strike grants increased damage dealt for 10 seconds. Bonus is doubled if a Behemoth's head is struck.
Priming attacks increases attack speed by 10% until the combo ends. Stacks.
Stagger damage is no longer halved when attacking Behemoth legs.
Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, damage and interrupting behemoths.
Hold to load ammo into the hammer. Release to create an aether vent that buffs players who step over it, granting them +40% damage reduction and up to 155 healing over 30 seconds when aethercharged.
Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, creating an aether vent that buffs players.
Shots and abilities deal frost damage.
Shots and abilities deal radiant damage.
Shots and abilities deal blaze damage.
Shots and abilities deal physical damage.
Shots and abilities deal shock damage.
Shots and abilities deal terra damage.
Shots and abilities deal umbral damage.
Fires a piercing bolt in a line, dealing damage that falls as it travels.
partEffect.1: Empowered: Deals greatly increased damage and pushes the slayer backwards.

partEffect.0: Fires a shot in a line, dealing 250 damage to the first Behemoth hit. If a part is struck, that part takes 40% more damage from Shots for 10 seconds.
partEffect.1: Empowered: Damage bonus increased to 80%, and 25% to all allies.

partEffect.0: Fires an explosive missile in a line, dealing 400 damage in an area upon impact.
partEffect.1: Empowered: Fires 3 missiles in a spread.

partEffect.0: Launches a collectible buff a short distance, granting 15% increased attack speed for 15 seconds when collected.
partEffect.1: Empowered: Grants the same buff to all Slayers.

partEffect.0: Launches an explosive mine that deals 400 damage. Mine charges after a short period, increasing damage to 700.
partEffect.1: Empowered: Deals 900 damage when charged and can interrupt Behemoths.

partEffect.0: Using an ability returns 4 ammo to the magazine.
While empowered, deal +50% damage to objects created by Behemoths.
Reduce both ability cooldowns by 2 seconds when dodging through Behemoth attacks.
Gain 20% increased movespeed when at 6 or less ammo.
Grants 2% critical strike chance for each round missing from the magazine.
Deal 5 increased damage when attacking the same part multiple times. Stacks up to 8 times.
Increases damage falloff range by 25%
Empowered Reloading at exactly 0 ammo decreases the cooldown of both abilities by 4 seconds.
Once charged, your next attack will deal 550 bonus radiant damage. Charge rate increases with current health.
Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to generate a shadow orb that increases damage dealt by 2.5% for 5 seconds. If 5 or more orbs are present, the bonus doubles.
Evading drops 6 Ice Mines on a 30 second cooldown.
The tenth hit in quick succession deals 250 bonus damage and major blaze damage
The last 4 shots in your magazine generate a Frost Sprite that cause your next attack to deal 50 bonus damage and minor frost damage. Max 4 Sprites.
Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to grant a stacking, refreshing 40 health shield that lasts for 12s.
Become unstaggerable while in special.
Triple Elements combo finisher can be performed twice, dealing +100 damage on the 2nd use.
Dealing damage while in special generates a small amount of special meter
Dodge attacks always critically strike.
Reduces the stamina cost of Repeating Elements by 25% and each Repeating Elements attack grants +5% attack speed (up to 30%) until the combo is ended.
Activate at full meter to start to spin, damaging nearby enemies for the duration. Reactive to slash in a direction, damaging enemies.
Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, increasing attack speed and causing attacks to deal AoE damage. Reactivate to parry and riposte a behemoth attack.
Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, increasing attack speed and causing attacks to deal aoe damage. Reactivate to dash in a direction (incurs a short cooldown).
Increases damage dealt by 3% each time Piercing and Harvesting attacks are alternated. Resets upon combo end.
After a dodge piercing attack, gain +50% wound damage for 8 seconds.
Each time the Behemoth is wounded, gain +6% damage
Pike charge attack no longer costs stamina and always critically strikes.
Stored ammo quality increases slowly over time, up to max.
Use to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to fire a missile that damages and can interrupt Behemoths.
Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo and perform a flying lunge attack that deals up to 1200 damage based on distance and ammo quality.
Use to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to create an aura that buffs nearby allies with critical strike chance. Duration increases with ammo quality.
